column4: theres this one guy who told me typing 'sudo rm -rf /' fixes an exploit on ubuntu, ive never seen him before so i want to make sure and see if it actually does.
i would not do it
no, the function on C to get that passwd keeps that display blank
can you clarify that please? what is your network layout, elaborate
i tried but couldnt find it
i double click it and it doesnt start
if you right click on the icon, what do you get?
can you select open?  and lets see if it runs
i get normal file stuff, open, copy, rename..............................
can you select open?  and lets see if it runs
i tried it doenst work
im in there and i have alot of them
sorry my devices.list is (hd0)/dev/sda
can you paste the contents of your menu.lst ? and does that menu.lst resides on your /dev/hda1 ?
one sec
replace this UUID=7c8c7eb1-d480-40f0-a3b8-aa4b348b1a09  with /dev/sda0 and see if it makes a difference
install icecast and ices2
E: Couldn't find package icecast

if you have the tools, then start the daemon that streams
you have your playlist in /etc/ices2  yes?
ahh you meant recorded live tv.. :P
